languages.text: Досужая болтовня на мостике корабля строжайше запрещена, однако в ожидании рапорта или отчета офицеры все же находят возможность обсудить последние события.
Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.
languages.original_text: Досужая болтовня на мостике корабля строжайше запрещена, однако в ожидании рапорта или отчета офицеры все же находят возможность обсудить последние события.

traits.locale_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.
Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.
Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.
Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.

languages.text: Tout bavardage inutile est strictement interdit sur la passerelle, même si les officiers profitent parfois de leurs tâches respectives pour discuter des derniers événements.
languages.original_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.

traits.locale_text: Tout bavardage inutile est strictement interdit sur la passerelle, même si les officiers profitent parfois de leurs tâches respectives pour discuter des derniers événements.

languages.text: La cháchara está estrictamente prohibida en el puente, aunque los oficiales siempre encuentran tiempo para comentar los últimos acontecimientos entre tareas.
languages.original_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.

traits.locale_text: La cháchara está estrictamente prohibida en el puente, aunque los oficiales siempre encuentran tiempo para comentar los últimos acontecimientos entre tareas.

languages.text: ブリッジでは無駄話は厳禁だが、仕事の合間には士官たちが最新情勢について話し合うこともある。
languages.original_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.

traits.locale_text: ブリッジでは無駄話は厳禁だが、仕事の合間には士官たちが最新情勢について話し合うこともある。

languages.text: 舰桥上禁止闲聊。不过，在执行任务的间隙，军官们还是会聚在一起讨论讨论最新的情况。
languages.original_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.

traits.locale_text: 舰桥上禁止闲聊。不过，在执行任务的间隙，军官们还是会聚在一起讨论讨论最新的情况。

languages.text: Private Plaudereien sind auf der Brücke streng verboten, aber zwischen ihren Schichten finden die Offiziere stets Zeit, die neuesten Entwicklungen zu besprechen.
languages.original_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.

traits.locale_text: Private Plaudereien sind auf der Brücke streng verboten, aber zwischen ihren Schichten finden die Offiziere stets Zeit, die neuesten Entwicklungen zu besprechen.

languages.text: Köprüde boş muhabbetler yapmak kati surette yasaktır ancak subaylar, vazifeler arasında son gelişmeleri tartışma fırsatı bulurlar.
languages.original_text: Idle chatter is strictly forbidden on the bridge, although between tasks the officers still find the opportunity to discuss the latest developments.
